trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of extensions for a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified extension to the collection of extensions.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的擴充功能加入至擴充集合。

trans-unit.source: When this overload is used, each workflow instance that requests this extension type will get the extension instance provided to this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載時，此延伸模組類型會要求每個工作流程執行個體就會收到提供給這個方法的擴充執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If each workflow instance should have its own instance of the extension, use the other <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果每個工作流程執行個體應該有自己的延伸模組的執行個體，請使用其他<xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>多載。</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何一個<xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>之後呼叫多載<xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>、<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Marks the collection of extensions as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 將標示為唯讀的延伸的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a workflow host is prepared for execution.
trans-unit.target: 準備好要執行的工作流程主機時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after MakeReadOnly, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何一個<xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>MakeReadOnly 之後, 呼叫多載<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>
